component.description: OutputPanel is used to group content on a page.
component.attributes:
&standard_uicomponent_attributes;
style false java.lang.String Style of the html container element.
styleClass false java.lang.String StyleClass of the html container element.
autoUpdate false java.lang.Boolean false Updates outputPanel after each ajax request implicity.
deferred false java.lang.Boolean false Deferred mode loads the contents after page load to speed up page load.
deferredMode false java.lang.String load Defines deferred loading mode, valid values are "load" (after page load) and "visible" (once the panel is visible on scroll). Default value is "load".
global false java.lang.Boolean false Global ajax requests are listened by ajaxStatus component, setting global to false will not trigger ajaxStatus on deferred loading. Default is false.
layout false java.lang.String block Shortcut for the css display property, valid values are block (default) and inline.
delay false java.lang.String Delay in milliseconds to wait before initiating a deferred loading, default value is "none".
